column1: Baby Barnaby's////What we have here folks is something many restaurants could learn a lesson from: what Baby Barnaby's does
column3: is simple food made using quality ingredients
column6: but as rare as it's become
column7: it seems an age old lesson has been lost in modern translation. Baby Barnaby's brings back age old traditions but with a modern
column8: friendly attitude. It's the best of both worlds.
